title: Schema for the AppScope event/metric body
description: Metadata about the process in which AppScope is running.

_time.title: _time
_time.description: The moment in time when AppScope reported the event or metric. In UNIX time with integer part in seconds and fractional part in microseconds.

_value.title: _value
_value.description: The value reported by the event or metric.

args.title: args
args.description: The arguments with which the scoped app was run.

cmd.title: cmd
cmd.description: The command that was run to start the scoped app.

data.title: data
data.description: The data that the scoped app emitted as output.

gid.title: gid
gid.description: Group ID of the user who created the process.

groupname.title: groupname
groupname.description: Groupname of the user who created the process.

metric_type_counter.title: counter
metric_type_counter.description: Indicates that the metric is a counter.

metric_type_gauge.title: gauge
metric_type_gauge.description: Indicates that the metric is a gauge.

metric_type_histogram.title: histogram
metric_type_histogram.description: Indicates that the metric from the scoped app is a histogram.

metric_type_timer.title: timer
metric_type_timer.description: Indicates that the metric is a timer.

sourcefile.title: file
sourcefile.description: String that describes a file path.

sourceconsolestderrstdout.title: source
sourceconsolestderrstdout.description: Specifies whether AppScope is capturing either `stderr` or `stdout` from console.

sourcednsduration.title: dns.duration
sourcednsduration.description: Indicates that the Source is a DNS duration operation.

sourcednsreq.title: dns.req
sourcednsreq.description: Indicates that the Source is a Network DNS operation.

sourcednsresp.title: dns.resp
sourcednsresp.description: Indicates that the Source is a DNS response operation .

sourcefsclose.title: fs.close
sourcefsclose.description: Indicates that the Source is a File Close operation.

sourcefsdelete.title: fs.delete
sourcefsdelete.description: Indicates that the Source is a File Delete operation.

sourcefsduration.title: fs.duration
sourcefsduration.description: Indicates that the Source is a File Duration operation.

sourcefserror.title: fs.error
sourcefserror.description: Indicates that the Source is a File Error operation.

sourcefsopen.title: fs.open
sourcefsopen.description: Indicates that the Source is a File open operation.

sourcefsread.title: fs.read
sourcefsread.description: Indicates that the Source is a File Read operation.

sourcefsseek.title: fs.seek
sourcefsseek.description: Indicates that the Source is a File Seek operation.

sourcefsstat.title: fs.stat
sourcefsstat.description: Indicates that the Source is a File Stat operation.

sourcefswrite.title: fs.write
sourcefswrite.description: Indicates that the Source is a File Write operation.

sourcehttpresp.title: http.resp
sourcehttpresp.description: Indicates that the Source is an HTTP response.

sourcehttpreq.title: http.req
sourcehttpreq.description: Indicates that the event Source is an HTTP request.

sourcehttpreqs.title: http.req
sourcehttpreqs.description: Indicates that the metric Source aggregates HTTP requests and responses.

sourcehttpdurationclient.title: http.duration.client
sourcehttpdurationclient.description: Indicates that the Source is a counter that measures HTTP client duration.

sourcehttpreqcontentlength.title: http.req.content_length
sourcehttpreqcontentlength.description: Indicates that the Source is a counter that measures HTTP request content length.

sourcehttprespcontentlength.title: http.resp.content_length
sourcehttprespcontentlength.description: Indicates that the Source is a counter that measures HTTP response content length.

sourcehttpdurationserver.title: http.duration.server
sourcehttpdurationserver.description: Indicates that the Source is a counter that measures HTTP server duration.

sourcenetclose.title: net.close
sourcenetclose.description: Indicates that the Source is a Network Close operation.

sourcenetapp.title: net.app
sourcenetapp.description: Indicates that the Source is a Network App (protocol detection) operation.

sourcenetduration.title: net.duration
sourcenetduration.description: Indicates that the Source is a counter that measures Network duration.

sourceneterror.title: net.error
sourceneterror.description: Indicates that the Source is a Network Error operation.

sourcenetopen.title: net.open
sourcenetopen.description: Indicates that the Source is a Network Open operation.

sourcenetother.title: net.other
sourcenetother.description: Indicates that the Source is a Network operation of an other-than-standard kind.

sourcenetport.title: net.port
sourcenetport.description: Indicates that the Source is a gauge that identifies open ports.

sourcenetrx.title: net.rx
sourcenetrx.description: Indicates that the Source is a Network receive operation.

sourcenettcp.title: net.tcp
sourcenettcp.description: Indicates that the Source is a gauge that shows the current count of open TCP ports.

sourcenettx.title: net.tx
sourcenettx.description: Indicates that the Source is a Network transmit operation.

sourcenetudp.title: net.udp
sourcenetudp.description: Indicates that the Source is a gauge that shows the current count of open UDP ports.

sourcenotice.title: notice
sourcenotice.description: Indicates that the Source is an AppScope notification.

sourceprocchild.title: proc.child
sourceprocchild.description: Indicates that the Source is a gauge of child processes spawned.

sourceproccpu.title: proc.cpu
sourceproccpu.description: Indicates that the Source is a counter of microseconds of the process's CPU were scheduled.

sourceproccpuperc.title: proc.cpu_perc
sourceproccpuperc.description: Indicates that the Source is a gauge that measures percentage of CPU used by the process.

sourceprocfd.title: proc.fd
sourceprocfd.description: Indicates that the Source is a gauge that reports how many file descriptors the process has opened.

sourceprocmem.title: proc.mem
sourceprocmem.description: Indicates that the Source is a gauge that reports process memory consumption.

sourceprocstart.title: proc.start
sourceprocstart.description: Indicates that the Source is a counter which can only be 1, meaning that the process has started.

sourceprocthread.title: proc.thread
sourceprocthread.description: Indicates that the Source is a gauge that reports how many threads are runnning in the process.

sourcetypeconsole.title: console
sourcetypeconsole.description: Indicates that the Sourcetype is console.

sourcetypefile.title: file
sourcetypefile.description: Indicates that the Sourcetype is file.

sourcetypedns.title: dns
sourcetypedns.description: Indicates that the Sourcetype is DNS.

sourcetypefs.title: fs
sourcetypefs.description: Indicates that the Sourcetype is filesystem.

sourcetypehttp.title: http
sourcetypehttp.description: Indicates that the Sourcetype is HTTP.

sourcetypemetric.title: metric
sourcetypemetric.description: Indicates that the Sourcetype is metric.

sourcetypenet.title: net
sourcetypenet.description: Indicates that the Sourcetype is net (meaning network).

uid.title: uid
uid.description: User ID of the user who created the process.

username.title: username
username.description: Username of the user who created the process.
